statements: SELECT * FROM genetic_sequences;
SELECT sequence_id, organism_name FROM genetic_sequences ORDER BY organism_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM genetic_sequences WHERE organism_name = 'Bacteria';
SELECT organism_name, COUNT(sequence_id) AS sequence_count FROM genetic_sequences GROUP BY organism_name;
SELECT * FROM genetic_sequences LIMIT 3 OFFSET 2;
SELECT * FROM genetic_sequences WHERE sequence_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT sequence_id, organism_name FROM genetic_sequences WHERE sequence_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000','223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000');
SELECT * FROM genetic_sequences WHERE organism_name = 'E. coli' AND sequence_id LIKE '123e4567%';
SELECT organism_name, sequence_data FROM genetic_sequences ORDER BY sequence_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM genetic_sequences WHERE organism_name like 'B%';
SELECT * FROM GeneSequences;
SELECT sequence FROM GeneSequences WHERE id = 1;
SELECT annotation_id, annotation_text FROM SequenceAnnotations ORDER BY annotation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM GeneSequences WHERE sequence LIKE '%AGT%';
SELECT id, sequence FROM GeneSequences WHERE id >= 5;
SELECT id, sequence FROM GeneSequences WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM GeneSequences WHERE sequence LIKE '%ACGT%';
SELECT s.id, s.sequence, a.annotation_text FROM GeneSequences s JOIN SequenceAnnotations a ON s.id = a.sequence_id;
SELECT MAX(id) AS max_id FROM GeneSequences;
SELECT DISTINCT sequence FROM GeneSequences ORDER BY sequence DESC;
SELECT * FROM SequenceData;
SELECT sequence_id, sequence_name FROM SequenceData WHERE sequence_id > 100;
SELECT gene_symbol, gene_description FROM GeneInfo WHERE gene_id = 45;
SELECT analysis_id, gene_symbol, analysis_result FROM SequenceAnalysis JOIN GeneInfo ON SequenceAnalysis.gene_id = GeneInfo.gene_id;
SELECT sequence_name, gene_symbol, analysis_result FROM SequenceData JOIN GeneInfo ON SequenceData.sequence_id = 15 JOIN SequenceAnalysis ON SequenceData.sequence_id = SequenceAnalysis.sequence_id;
SELECT sequence_name, sequence_id, sequence_content FROM SequenceData;
SELECT gene_description, gene_id, gene_symbol FROM GeneInfo ORDER BY gene_id DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, sequence_id, gene_id, analysis_result FROM SequenceAnalysis WHERE analysis_id < 10;
SELECT * FROM GeneInfo JOIN SequenceAnalysis ON GeneInfo.gene_id = SequenceAnalysis.gene_id;

SELECT sequence_name, gene_symbol, analysis_result FROM SequenceData JOIN SequenceAnalysis ON SequenceData.sequence_id = SequenceAnalysis.sequence_id JOIN GeneInfo ON SequenceAnalysis.gene_id = GeneInfo.gene_id;
SELECT * FROM sequences;
SELECT sequence_name, sequence_data FROM sequences;
SELECT gene_name, chromosome, start_position, end_position FROM genes;
SELECT * FROM annotations WHERE gene_id = 1;
SELECT gene_name, mutation_type, mutation_description FROM genes JOIN mutations ON genes.gene_id = mutations.gene_id;
SELECT * FROM genes WHERE strand = '+' ORDER BY gene_id DESC;
SELECT gene_name, chromosome, start_position, end_position FROM genes WHERE chromosome = 'X';
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, chromosome, start_position, mutation_type FROM genes JOIN mutations ON genes.gene_id = mutations.gene_id WHERE mutation_position > 1000;

SELECT annotations.annotation_data, genes.gene_name, genes.start_position FROM annotations JOIN genes ON annotations.gene_id = genes.gene_id WHERE annotations.annotation_data LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY genes.start_position ASC;

SELECT genes.gene_name, mutations.mutation_type, mutations.mutation_description FROM genes JOIN mutations ON genes.gene_id = mutations.gene_id WHERE genes.chromosome = 'Y' AND mutations.mutation_type = 'insertion' ORDER BY genes.gene_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Genes;
SELECT gene_name, chromosome, location_start FROM Genes;
SELECT * FROM Variants WHERE variant_type = 'SNP';
SELECT gene_name, chromosome, location_start, location_end FROM Genes ORDER BY chromosome DESC;
SELECT annotation_text, annotation_author FROM Annotations;
SELECT * FROM Genes;
SELECT gene_name, chromosome FROM Genes WHERE location_start < 1000;

SELECT Variants.variant_type, Genes.gene_name, Sequences.sequence_data FROM Variants INNER JOIN Genes ON Variants.gene_id = Genes.gene_id INNER JOIN Sequences ON Variants.gene_id = Sequences.gene_id WHERE Variants.variant_type = 'SNP';

SELECT Samples.sample_name, Sequences.sequence_data, Annotations.annotation_text FROM Samples INNER JOIN Sequences ON Samples.sequence_id = Sequences.sequence_id LEFT JOIN Annotations ON Sequences.gene_id = Annotations.variant_id;
SELECT Genes.gene_name, MAX(Sequences.sequence_id) AS max_sequence_id FROM Genes INNER JOIN Sequences ON Genes.gene_id = Sequences.gene_id GROUP BY Genes.gene_name;
